string-array.name: question0
string-array.item: One reason why a diamond axe may be a better weapon than a diamond sword is because a diamond axe
Can receive mending through an enchanting table, whereas the sword cannot

string-array.name: question1
string-array.item: A hoe is enchanted with 5 levels of experience. What is the chance that the hoe will receive only unbreaking?

string-array.name: question2
string-array.item: One bone can be used to craft how many bone meal?

string-array.name: question3
string-array.item: Two stone pickaxes, one with 40 durability and the other with 60 durability, are combined in a crafting table. How much durability will the resulting stone pickaxe have?

string-array.name: question4
string-array.item: Marcus Persson is the creator of Minecraft. What nickname is he commonly given?

string-array.name: question5
string-array.item: The following command is executed: /tp steve ~5 ~ ~ In what direction will steve move?

string-array.name: question6
string-array.item: When creating portals, one block in the nether corresponds to how many blocks in the overworld?

string-array.name: question7
string-array.item: Data for a Food in Minecraft [Saturation Restored 12.8 Saturation Ratio 1.6] Saturation Ratio = Saturation Restored / Hunger Points Provided How many hunger points does this food provide?

string-array.name: question8
string-array.item: Data for a Food in Minecraft [Saturation Restored 12.8 Saturation Ratio 1.6] Saturation Ratio = Saturation Restored / Hunger Points Provided What food has the properties depicted in the table?

string-array.name: question9
string-array.item: What resource do zombie pigmen drop?

string-array.name: question10
string-array.item: How many redstone is needed to craft a clock?

string-array.name: question11
string-array.item: How is a bottle o’ enchanting obtained?

string-array.name: question12
string-array.item: On what kind of tree do cocoa beans generate?

string-array.name: question13
string-array.item: Adding redstone to a potion causes what?
It increases the duration of the potion
It increases the strength of the potion
It negates the effect (for example, a potion of healing turns to a potion of damage)
Redstone cannot be added to a brewing stand

string-array.name: question14
string-array.item: Which block will not move when there is air below it?

string-array.name: question15
string-array.item: Which effect will increase mining speed?

string-array.name: question16
string-array.item: What (if anything) is wrong with the following client command? /tp 4000000 0 0
The player to be teleported is not specified
Unloaded chunks cannot be teleported to
Nothing; the command will execute without error

string-array.name: question17
string-array.item: What kind of villager wears a white robe?

string-array.name: question18
string-array.item: How many sticks can be crafted from one wood (not wooden plank)?

string-array.name: question19
string-array.item: In what game do players try to mine the blocks under their opponents?

string-array.name: question20
string-array.item: Which is not a type of minecart that can be crafted?

string-array.name: question21
string-array.item: I. Blaze Powder II. Charcoal/Coal III. Gunpowder Which of these items are needed to craft a fire charge?

string-array.name: question22
string-array.item: I. Blaze Powder II. Charcoal/Coal III. Gunpowder Which of these items can be used as fuel?

string-array.name: question23
string-array.item: In the nether, nether quartz ore is about as abundant as which ore in the overworld?

string-array.name: question24
string-array.item: Suppose a torch (light level 14) is placed in a large flat cavern at (x,y,z)=(1,100,1). What is the light level at (4,100,-3), assuming no other light sources?

string-array.name: question25
string-array.item: The default flat surface area enclosed by the world border is about how many blocks?

string-array.name: question26
string-array.item: "It’s more magical than that! It automatically opens and turns towards players who get close”. Who said the quote?

string-array.name: question27
string-array.item: “It’s more magical than that! It automatically opens and turns towards players who get close”. What block is being described?

string-array.name: question28
string-array.item: Assume roll=2 and the p-value of an unstackable item is .185. What is the chance that exactly one item appears?

string-array.name: question29
string-array.item: What is the average y-coordinate for the surface of an ocean biome?

string-array.name: question30
string-array.item: What blast resistance do all ore blocks have?

string-array.name: question31
string-array.item: The following commands are in a default redstone-ready preset world //fill 6 1 7 4 9 2 minecraft:dirt //fill 7 8 3 6 5 1 minecraft:stone After execution, how many dirt blocks will be in the world?

string-array.name: question32
string-array.item: The following commands are in a default redstone-ready preset world //fill 6 1 7 4 9 2 minecraft:dirt //fill 7 8 3 6 5 1 minecraft:stone 34. After execution, how many stone blocks will be in the world?

string-array.name: question33
string-array.item: Which dye cannot be obtained without crafting?

string-array.name: question34
string-array.item: Which type of pressure plate will increase the strength of the redstone signal emitted for each additional item dropped onto it (until the signal strength is 15)?

string-array.name: question36
string-array.item: Which mob can only be attacked by melee damage and splash potions?

string-array.name: question38
string-array.item: I. doFireTick II. keepInventory III. mobGriefing Which of these gamerules is/are set to true by default?

string-array.name: question39
string-array.item: Which of the following commands has the same effect as /time set noon?

string-array.name: question40
string-array.item: Which of these commands requires the lowest op level (0) in multiplayer?

string-array.name: question41
string-array.item: Which plant block will break (and drop its item) if a block is placed adjacent to it?

string-array.name: question42
string-array.item: Which is the only command that can only be executed in single player?

string-array.name: question43
string-array.item: Which block forms when water flows into lava?
